name: Moggy Returns
description:
Beat Moggy in his desert as fast as possible, use your water gun and traps around the map to beat Moggy and reclaim the desert.

Controls:

WASD - Movement
CTRL - Grapple
SHIFT - Dash
SPACE - Jump

Made By: 

Bartosz Baranowski
Daniel Chung
Orlando James
Sophia Liles
Miles (Sam) Horseman
